scripts.start: cd Backend && set NODE_ENV=production&& node Server.js
scripts.build: cd Backend && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
scripts.dev: cd Backend && set NODE_ENV=development&& nodemon Server.js
scripts.win-start: cd Backend && set NODE_ENV=production&& node Server.js
scripts.win-dev: cd Backend && set NODE_ENV=development&& nodemon Server.js
